wikipedia_page.main: Peter John McKay (born 12 October 1994 in Burton-upon-Trent) is an English cricketer who played for Warwickshire between 2013 and 2015. He is a left-handed batsman who also plays as a wicket-keeper. McKay made his first-class debut for Warwickshire against Oxford MCCU in April 2013.

response: Peter McKay or Peter MacKay may refer to:
* Peter McKay (Australian politician) (born 1948), member of the Tasmanian Legislative Council
